information: Official Holidays and Religious Festivals: Grand Bazaar and Spice Market will be closed.
Grand Bazaar is closed on Sundays,
Topkapi Palace is closed on Tuesdays,
Beylerbeyi Palace and Dolmabahce Palace are closed on Mondays,

Please take in consideration dress code for the tours. Ex: comfortable shoes and clothes made of cotton or heavy coats for winter. Shorts are not allowed when entering mosques and please do not forget to carry Scarf with you because of visiting to Blue Mosque & St.Sophia Mosque.
If you have a tour and you must check-out on the same day to transfer to airport or for land transfer, please check out from the hotel in the morning before your tour.
Cappadocia hot air balloon rides pick-up times are always decided 1-day before the activity, we usually contact the clients via Whats App or hotel phone or in-person to inform them.
Please be ready on lobby floor minimum 5 minutes prior to pick up time for the tours and transfers.

SIC tours dates & times may change, pick-up times may change even after the clients have received the schedule. Sometimes museums or roads or weather is not suitable for certain tours and thus the date or time of the tour is changed by operations department.
Please note that full day private tour timings are from 09.00 – 17.00 or 10.00 – 18.00. These are pick up and drop off times from/to hotel.
* Prices are per person in Euro and may vary based on season and availability
* Prices are valid from 15/03/2026 till 15/11/2026
* Tour category will be confirmed at time of booking
titleEs: Estambul & Capadocia 5 Noches Tour en Grupo - Solo Terrestre
descriptionEs: Experimente lo mejor de IstanCuA, CappaCocia con este paquete de 5 Noches / 6 Días. Llegada a Estambul or SAW airport in Estambul. Traslado de llegada al hotel and registro. The rest of the day is yours. In the evening, you will pick up from the hotel and transfer to Bósforo Cruis...

itineraryEs.title: Vuelo / Estambul - Crucero por el Bósforo Dinner
itineraryEs.description: Llegada a Estambul or SAW airport in Estambul. Traslado de llegada al hotel and registro. The rest of the day is yours. In the evening, you will pick up from the hotel and transfer to Bósforo Cruise Dinner. (Cruise is not private) Enjoy delicious gourmet foods while you dance with the panaromic view of the Bósforo that separates the two continents Europe and Asia. Enjoy as you cruise The Bósforo and see historical places like Dolmabahce Palace, Bósforo Bridge, Ortakoy, Rumeli Fortress , Fatih Bridge, Beylerbeyi Palace, Maiden’s Tower and also Estambuls very famous night clubs as you wine and dine the night away. No other Estambul experience can match this unique combination of romantic ambiance. We combine fresh food with unparalleled views of Estambul and live entertainment to create Estambul‘s leading Bósforo Dinner Cruise. Show Program is including Whirling Dervish, Turkish Gypsy Dance, Caucasian Dance, Belly Dancer Group Show, Turkish Folk Dance, Rhythm Show, Belly Dancer Professional DJ Performance. After the tour, transfer back to hotel. Pernocte in Estambul.

itineraryEs.title: Estambul – Tour de Día Completo
itineraryEs.description: Después del desayuno en el hotel, a tour guiado to Hipódromo, Palacio de Topkapi, St. Sophia, Mezquita Azul and the Gran Bazar will commence. After the tour, transfer back to hotel. Pernocte in Estambul.

itineraryEs.title: Estambul – Vuelo / Capadocia
itineraryEs.description: Después del desayuno, check out from the hotel and according to your flight time transfer to Estambul or SAW airport for your flight to Kayseri or Nevsehir. Arrive in Kayseri or Nevsehir airport and transfer to your hotel in Capadocia. Pernocte in Capadocia.

As this will be a tour guiado, you will avoid being hassled which will enable you enjoy the shopping experience whilst gaining the knowledge of the ancient craftsmen. After the tour, transfer to your hotel. Free evening. Pernocte in Capadocia.

itineraryEs.title: Capadocia – Tour de Día Completo
itineraryEs.description: Después del desayuno, depart for our Capadocia tour including Ozkonak Underground City Goreme Panorama, Pigeon Valley, Uchisar Castle from outside. title: Istanbul, Kusadasi, Ephesus & Pamukkale 6 Nights Group Tour - Land Only
description: Experience the best of Istanbul, Kusadasi, Ephesus, Pamukkale with this 6 Nights / 7 Days package. Arrive to Istanbul or SAW airport in Istanbul. Arrival transfer to the hotel and check-in. The rest of the day is yours. Overnight in Istanbul....

itinerary.title: Fly / Istanbul
itinerary.description: Arrive to Istanbul or SAW airport in Istanbul. Arrival transfer to the hotel and check-in. The rest of the day is yours. Overnight in Istanbul.

itinerary.title: Istanbul – Full Day Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast at the hotel, a guided tour to Hippodrome, Topkapi Palace, St. Sophia, Blue Mosque and the Grand Bazaar will commence. After the tour, transfer back to hotel. Overnight in Istanbul.

itinerary.title: Istanbul – Full Day Tour incl. Bosphorus Cruise
itinerary.description: After breakfast, your tour will start with Spice Bazaar and then it goes on with Bosphorus Cruise (Boat is not private). In the afternoon cross over the Bosphorus Bridge to Asia and visit Camlica Hill. Transfer back to your hotel for overnight. Overnight in Istanbul.

itinerary.title: Istanbul / Fly / Izmir – Kusadasi
itinerary.description: After breakfast, according to your flight time you will transfer to Istanbul or SAW airport for your flight to Izmir. Arrive in Izmir airport and transfer to your hotel. Overnight in Kusadasi.

itinerary.title: Kusadasi – Ephesus & Sirince Full Day Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast, departure for full day tour for ancient city of Ephesus, one of the most well-preserved archaeological sites in the world and also includes a visit to the iconic Temple of Artemis, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World. You will explore The Grand Theater, The Library of Celsus, The Temple of Hadrian, The Curetes Street.  After concluding the tour of Ephesus, you will proceed Sirince Village. Sirince is a cute little village with a fun history, beautiful views, wonderful food, hospitality, and so much more. It's perhaps the perfect synthesis of a traditional Turkish village and traditional Greek village. After the tour, transfer back to hotel.  Overnight in Kusadasi.

itinerary.title: Kusadasi – Pamukkale Full Day Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast drive to Pamukkale which is the center of natural thermal spring waters with healing properties. Then visit the travertines and the ancient city of Hierapolis which has the biggest Nekropol with 1200 gravestones in Anatolia. After tour, we will drive to our hotel at Kusadasi. Overnight in Kusadasi.

itinerary.title: Kusadasi - Izmir/ Fly / Istanbul / Fly
itinerary.description: After breakfast, check out from the hotel. You will have free time until transfer to Izmir airport for your flight back to Istanbul to catch your flight to your next destination. The tour ends with great memories. Have a safe trip back home and thanks for choosing Funny Tourism for your holiday.

After the tour return to the hotel. Overnight in Antalya.

(Cruise is not private) Enjoy delicious gourmet foods while you dance with the panaromic view of the Bósforo that separates the two continents Europe and Asia. Enjoy as you cruise The Bósforo and see historical places like Dolmabahce Palace, Bósforo Bridge, Ortakoy, Rumeli Fortress , Fatih Bridge, Beylerbeyi Palace, Maiden’s Tower and also Estambuls very famous night clubs as you wine and dine the night away. No other Estambul experience can match this unique combination of romantic ambiance. We combine fresh food with unparalleled views of Estambul and live entertainment to create Estambul‘s leading Bósforo Dinner Cruise. Show Program is including Whirling Dervish, Turkish Gypsy Dance, Caucasian Dance, Belly Dancer Group Show, Turkish Folk Dance, Rhythm Show, Belly Dancer Professional DJ Performance. After the tour, transfer back to hotel. Pernocte in Estambul.

itineraryEs.title: Estambul – Tour de Día Completo
itineraryEs.description: Después del desayuno en el hotel, a tour guiado to Hipódromo, Palacio de Topkapi, St. Sophia, Mezquita Azul and the Gran Bazar will commence. After the tour, transfer back to hotel. Pernocte in Estambul.

itineraryEs.title: Estambul / Vuelo / Antalya
itineraryEs.description: Después del desayuno, according to your flight time you will transfer you to the Estambul or SAW Airport for your domestic flight to Antalya. On arrival you will check in to your hotel. The rest of the day is yours. Pernocte in Antalya.

itineraryEs.title: Antalya – Tour de Día Completo
itineraryEs.description: Después del desayuno, depart for sightseeing of Antalya. Meet your guide and drive to Duden Waterfalls the place where the falls meet the sea and have a photo break in Konyaalti beach. Then visit to old town with the gate of Hadrian, the Clock Tower, Fluted Minaret, Palm Street and the ancient harbor. There are many beautiful old houses in Kaleici. After the tour return to the hotel. Pernocte in Antalya.

itineraryEs.title: Antalya – Pamukkale Tour de Día Completo
itineraryEs.description: Después del desayuno drive to Pamukkale which is the center of natural thermal spring waters with healing properties. Then visit the travertines and the ancient city of Hierapolis which has the biggest Nekropol with 1200 gravestones in Anatolia. After tour, we will drive to our hotel at Antalya. Pernocte in Antalya.

itineraryEs.title: Antalya / Vuelo / Estambul / Vuelo
itineraryEs.description: Después del desayuno, check out from the hotel. You will rest at the hotel and have a free afternoon until transfers to Antalya airport for our flight back to Estambul to catch your flight to your next destination. The tour ends with great memories. Have a safe trip back home and thanks for choosing Funny Tourism for your holiday.

title: Istanbul, Cappadocia, Kusadasi, Ephesus & Pamukkale 7 Nights Group Tour - Land Only
description: Experience the best of Istanbul, Cappadocia, Kusadasi, Ephesus, Pamukkale with this 7 Nights / 8 Days package. Arrive to Istanbul or SAW airport in Istanbul. Arrival transfer to the hotel and check-in. The rest of the day is yours. In the evening, you will pick up from the hotel and transfer to Bosphorus Cruis...

itinerary.title: Fly / Istanbul - Bosphorus Cruise Dinner
itinerary.description: Arrive to Istanbul or SAW airport in Istanbul. Arrival transfer to the hotel and check-in. The rest of the day is yours. In the evening, you will pick up from the hotel and transfer to Bosphorus Cruise Dinner. (Cruise is not private) Enjoy delicious gourmet foods while you dance with the panaromic view of the Bosphorus that separates the two continents Europe and Asia. Enjoy as you cruise The Bosphorus and see historical places like Dolmabahce Palace, Bosphorus Bridge, Ortakoy, Rumeli Fortress , Fatih Bridge, Beylerbeyi Palace, Maiden’s Tower and also Istanbuls very famous night clubs as you wine and dine the night away. No other Istanbul experience can match this unique combination of romantic ambiance. We combine fresh food with unparalleled views of Istanbul and live entertainment to create Istanbul‘s leading Bosphorus Dinner Cruise. Show Program is including Whirling Dervish, Turkish Gypsy Dance, Caucasian Dance, Belly Dancer Group Show, Turkish Folk Dance, Rhythm Show, Belly Dancer Professional DJ Performance. After the tour, transfer back to hotel. Overnight in Istanbul.

itinerary.title: Istanbul – Full Day Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast at the hotel, a guided tour to Hippodrome, Topkapi Palace, St. Sophia, Blue Mosque and the Grand Bazaar will commence. After the tour, transfer back to hotel. Overnight in Istanbul.

itinerary.title: Istanbul – Fly / Cappadocia
itinerary.description: After breakfast, check out from the hotel and according to your flight time transfer to Istanbul or SAW airport for your flight to Kayseri or Nevsehir. Arrive in Kayseri or Nevsehir airport and transfer to your hotel in Cappadocia. Overnight in Cappadocia.

itinerary.title: Cappadocia – Full Day Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast, depart for our Cappadocia tour including; Ozkonak Underground City, Dervent (Imagination Valley) Zelve Open Air Museum, Pasabag Valley, Goreme Panorama. This tour is including Indian Lunch in Pukka Indian Restaurant. After lunch, we will make a shopping tour in which you will be aware of the ancient arts of Turkey like carpet weaving, leather manufacturing and jewellery. As this will be a guided tour, you will avoid being hassled which will enable you enjoy the shopping experience whilst gaining the knowledge of the ancient craftsmen. After the tour, transfer to your hotel. Free evening. Overnight in Cappadocia.

itinerary.title: Cappadocia - Kayseri Fly Izmir - Kusadasi
itinerary.description: After breakfast, you will pick up from the hotel and transfer to Kayseri airport for your flight to Izmir. Arrive in Izmir airport and transfer to your hotel in Kusadasi. The rest of the day is yours. Overnight in Kusadasi.

itinerary.title: Kusadasi – Ephesus & Sirince Full Day Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast, departure for full day tour for ancient city of Ephesus, one of the most well-preserved archaeological sites in the world and also includes a visit to the iconic Temple of Artemis, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World. You will explore The Grand Theater, The Library of Celsus, The Temple of Hadrian, The Curetes Street.  After concluding the tour of Ephesus, you will proceed Sirince Village. Sirince is a cute little village with a fun history, beautiful views, wonderful food, hospitality, and so much more. It's perhaps the perfect synthesis of a traditional Turkish village and traditional Greek village. After the tour, transfer back to hotel.  Overnight in Kusadasi.

itinerary.title: Kusadasi – Pamukkale Full Day Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast drive to Pamukkale which is the center of natural thermal spring waters with healing properties. Then visit the travertines and the ancient city of Hierapolis which has the biggest Nekropol with 1200 gravestones in Anatolia. After tour, we will drive to our hotel at Kusadasi. Overnight in Kusadasi.

itinerary.title: Kusadasi - Izmir / Fly / Istanbul / Fly
itinerary.description: After breakfast, check out from the hotel. You will have free time until transfer to Izmir airport for your flight back to Istanbul to catch your flight to your next destination. The tour ends with great memories. Have a safe trip back home and thanks for choosing Funny Tourism for your holiday.

included: Meals are as per itinerary with code letters (B=Breakfast, L=Lunch, D=Dinner)
Return airport transfers on Private basis
Bosphorus Cruise Dinner with Turkish Night Show including 2 glasses of non-alcohol soft drinks with return transfers on SIC basis
Professional English-Speaking Guidance on tour days
Sightseeings as per itinerary on SIC (Group Tours) basis with entrance fees for mentioned places
Local Taxes
notIncluded: Tips to the driver and the guide
information: Official Holidays and Religious Festivals: Grand Bazaar and Spice Market will be closed.
Grand Bazaar is closed on Sundays,
Topkapi Palace is closed on Tuesdays,
Beylerbeyi Palace and Dolmabahce Palace are closed on Mondays,

Please take in consideration dress code for the tours. Ex: comfortable shoes and clothes made of cotton or heavy coats for winter. Shorts are not allowed when entering mosques and please do not forget to carry Scarf with you because of visiting to Blue Mosque & St.Sophia Mosque.
If you have a tour and you must check-out on the same day to transfer to airport or for land transfer, please check out from the hotel in the morning before your tour.
Cappadocia hot air balloon rides pick-up times are always decided 1-day before the activity, we usually contact the clients via Whats App or hotel phone or in-person to inform them.
Please be ready on lobby floor minimum 5 minutes prior to pick up time for the tours and transfers.

SIC tours dates & times may change, pick-up times may change even after the clients have received the schedule. Sometimes museums or roads or weather is not suitable for certain tours and thus the date or time of the tour is changed by operations department.
Please note that full day private tour timings are from 09.00 – 17.00 or 10.00 – 18.00. These are pick up and drop off times from/to hotel.
* Prices are per person in Euro and may vary based on season and availability
* Prices are valid from 15/03/2026 till 15/11/2026
* Tour category will be confirmed at time of booking

You will explore The Grand Theater, The Library of Celsus, The Temple of Hadrian, The Curetes Street.  After concluding the tour of Ephesus, you will proceed Sirince Village. Sirince is a cute little village with a fun history, beautiful views, wonderful food, hospitality, and so much more. It's perhaps the perfect synthesis of a traditional Turkish village and traditional Greek village. After the tour, transfer back to hotel.  Overnight in Kusadasi.

itinerary.title: Kusadasi – Pamukkale Full Day Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast drive to Pamukkale which is the center of natural thermal spring waters with healing properties. Then visit the travertines and the ancient city of Hierapolis which has the biggest Nekropol with 1200 gravestones in Anatolia. After tour, we will drive to our hotel at Kusadasi. Overnight in Kusadasi.

itinerary.title: Kusadasi / Fly / Izmir / Fly
itinerary.description: After breakfast, check out from the hotel. You will have free time until transfer to Izmir airport for your flight back to Istanbul to catch your flight to your next destination. The tour ends with great memories. Have a safe trip back home and thanks for choosing Funny Tourism for your holiday.

included: Meals are as per itinerary with code letters (B=Breakfast, L=Lunch, D=Dinner)
Return airport transfers on Private basis
Professional English-Speaking Guidance on tour days
Sightseeings as per itinerary on SIC (Group Tours) basis with entrance fees for mentioned places
Local Taxes
notIncluded: Tips to the driver and the guide
information: Official Holidays and Religious Festivals: Grand Bazaar and Spice Market will be closed.
Grand Bazaar is closed on Sundays,
Topkapi Palace is closed on Tuesdays,
Beylerbeyi Palace and Dolmabahce Palace are closed on Mondays,

Please take in consideration dress code for the tours. Ex: comfortable shoes and clothes made of cotton or heavy coats for winter. Shorts are not allowed when entering mosques and please do not forget to carry Scarf with you because of visiting to Blue Mosque & St.Sophia Mosque.
If you have a tour and you must check-out on the same day to transfer to airport or for land transfer, please check out from the hotel in the morning before your tour.
Cappadocia hot air balloon rides pick-up times are always decided 1-day before the activity, we usually contact the clients via Whats App or hotel phone or in-person to inform them.
Please be ready on lobby floor minimum 5 minutes prior to pick up time for the tours and transfers.

SIC tours dates & times may change, pick-up times may change even after the clients have received the schedule. Sometimes museums or roads or weather is not suitable for certain tours and thus the date or time of the tour is changed by operations department.
Please note that full day private tour timings are from 09.00 – 17.00 or 10.00 – 18.00. These are pick up and drop off times from/to hotel.
* Prices are per person in Euro and may vary based on season and availability
* Prices are valid from 15/03/2026 till 15/11/2026
* Tour category will be confirmed at time of booking
titleEs: Estambul, Capadocia, Kusadasi, Éfeso & Pamukkale 8 Noches Tour en Grupo - Solo Terrestre
descriptionEs: Experimente lo mejor de IstanCuA, CappaCocia, KusaCasi, Éfeso, PamukkaAe con este paquete de 8 Noches / 9 Días. Llegada a Estambul or SAW airport in Estambul. Traslado de llegada al hotel and registro. The rest of the day is yours. Pernocte in Estambul....

itineraryEs.title: Vuelo / Estambul
itineraryEs.description: Llegada a Estambul or SAW airport in Estambul. Traslado de llegada al hotel and registro. The rest of the day is yours. Pernocte in Estambul.

itineraryEs.title: Estambul – Tour de Día Completo
itineraryEs.description: Después del desayuno en el hotel, a tour guiado to Hipódromo, Palacio de Topkapi, St. Sophia, Mezquita Azul and the Gran Bazar will commence. After the tour, transfer back to hotel. Pernocte in Estambul.

itineraryEs.title: Estambul – Tour de Día Completo incl. Crucero por el Bósforo
itineraryEs.description: Después del desayuno, su tour comenzará with Bazar de las Especias and then it goes on with Bósforo Cruise (Boat is not private). In the afternoon cross over the Bósforo Bridge to Asia and visit Camlica Hill. Transfer back to your hotel for pernocte. Pernocte in Estambul.

itineraryEs.title: Estambul / Vuelo / Capadocia
itineraryEs.description: Después del desayuno, according to your flight time you will transfer to Estambul or SAW airport for your flight to Kayseri or Nevsehir. Arrive in Kayseri or Nevsehir airport and transfer to your hotel. Pernocte in Capadocia.

itineraryEs.title: Capadocia – Tour de Día Completo
itineraryEs.description: Después del desayuno, depart for our Capadocia tour including; Ozkonak Underground City, Dervent (Imagination Valley) Zelve Open Air Museum, Pasabag Valley, Goreme Panorama. This tour is including Indian Lunch in Pukka Indian Restaurant. After lunch, we will make a shopping tour in which you will be aware of the ancient arts of Turkey like carpet weaving, leather manufacturing and jewellery. As this will be a tour guiado, you will avoid being hassled which will enable you enjoy the shopping experience whilst gaining the knowledge of the ancient craftsmen. After the tour, transfer to your hotel. Free evening. Pernocte in Capadocia.

itineraryEs.title: Capadocia - Kayseri / Vuelo / Izmir - Kusadasi
itineraryEs.description: Después del desayuno, we will transfer you to the Kayseri Airport for your domestic flight to Izmir. On arrival you will check in to your hotel. The rest of the day is yours. Pernocte in Kusadasi.

Sirince is a cute little village with a fun history, beautiful views, wonderful food, hospitality, and so much more. It's perhaps the perfect synthesis of a traditional Turkish village and traditional Greek village. After the tour, transfer back to hotel.  Pernocte in Kusadasi.

Then visit the travertines and the ancient city of Hierapolis which has the biggest Nekropol with 1200 gravestones in Anatolia. After tour, we will drive to our hotel at Kusadasi. Pernocte in Kusadasi.

title: Istanbul, Kusadasi, Ephesus, Pamukkale & Antalya 7 Nights Group Tour - Land Only
description: Experience the best of Istanbul, Kusadasi, Ephesus, Pamukkale, Antalya with this 7 Nights / 8 Days package. Arrive to Istanbul or SAW airport in Istanbul. Arrival transfer to the hotel and check-in. The rest of the day is yours. In the evening, you will pick up from the hotel and transfer to Bosphorus Cruis...

itinerary.title: Fly / Istanbul - Bosphorus Cruise Dinner
itinerary.description: Arrive to Istanbul or SAW airport in Istanbul. Arrival transfer to the hotel and check-in. The rest of the day is yours. In the evening, you will pick up from the hotel and transfer to Bosphorus Cruise Dinner. (Cruise is not private) Enjoy delicious gourmet foods while you dance with the panaromic view of the Bosphorus that separates the two continents Europe and Asia. Enjoy as you cruise The Bosphorus and see historical places like Dolmabahce Palace, Bosphorus Bridge, Ortakoy, Rumeli Fortress , Fatih Bridge, Beylerbeyi Palace, Maiden’s Tower and also Istanbuls very famous night clubs as you wine and dine the night away. No other Istanbul experience can match this unique combination of romantic ambiance. We combine fresh food with unparalleled views of Istanbul and live entertainment to create Istanbul‘s leading Bosphorus Dinner Cruise. Show Program is including Whirling Dervish, Turkish Gypsy Dance, Caucasian Dance, Belly Dancer Group Show, Turkish Folk Dance, Rhythm Show, Belly Dancer Professional DJ Performance. After the tour, transfer back to hotel. Overnight in Istanbul.

itinerary.title: Istanbul – Full Day Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast at the hotel, a guided tour to Hippodrome, Topkapi Palace, St. Sophia, Blue Mosque and the Grand Bazaar will commence. After the tour, transfer back to hotel. Overnight in Istanbul.

itinerary.title: Istanbul – Izmir/Kusadasi
itinerary.description: After breakfast, check out from the hotel and according to your flight time transfer to Istanbul or SAW airport for your flight to Izmir. Arrive in Izmir airport and transfer to your hotel in Kusadasi. The rest of the day is yours. Overnight in Kusadasi.

Sirince is a cute little village with a fun history, beautiful views, wonderful food, hospitality, and so much more. It's perhaps the perfect synthesis of a traditional Turkish village and traditional Greek village. After the tour, transfer back to hotel.  Overnight in Kusadasi.

itinerary.title: Kusadasi – Pamukkale Full Day Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast drive to Pamukkale which is the center of natural thermal spring waters with healing properties. Then visit the travertines and the ancient city of Hierapolis which has the biggest Nekropol with 1200 gravestones in Anatolia. After tour, we will drive to our hotel at Pamukkale. Overnight in Pamukkale.

itinerary.title: Pamukkale Drive to Antalya
itinerary.description: After breakfast, check-out from the hotel and drive to Antalya. It takes about 3 hours. Arrive to Antalya and check in your hotel. The rest of the day is yours. Overnight in Antalya.

itinerary.title: Antalya – Full Day Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast, depart for sightseeing of Antalya. Meet your guide and drive to Duden Waterfalls the place where the falls meet the sea and have a photo break in Konyaalti beach. Then visit to old town with the gate of Hadrian, the Clock Tower, Fluted Minaret, Palm Street and the ancient harbor. There are many beautiful old houses in Kaleici. After the tour return to the hotel. Overnight in Antalya.

itinerary.title: Antalya / Fly / Istanbul / Fly
itinerary.description: After breakfast, check out from the hotel. You will have free time until transfer to Antalya airport for your flight back to Istanbul to catch your flight to your next destination. The tour ends with great memories. Have a safe trip back home and thanks for choosing Funny Tourism for your holiday.

information: Official Holidays and Religious Festivals: Grand Bazaar and Spice Market will be closed.
Grand Bazaar is closed on Sundays,
Topkapi Palace is closed on Tuesdays,
Beylerbeyi Palace and Dolmabahce Palace are closed on Mondays,

Please take in consideration dress code for the tours. Ex: comfortable shoes and clothes made of cotton or heavy coats for winter. Shorts are not allowed when entering mosques and please do not forget to carry Scarf with you because of visiting to Blue Mosque & St.Sophia Mosque.
If you have a tour and you must check-out on the same day to transfer to airport or for land transfer, please check out from the hotel in the morning before your tour.
Cappadocia hot air balloon rides pick-up times are always decided 1-day before the activity, we usually contact the clients via Whats App or hotel phone or in-person to inform them.
Please be ready on lobby floor minimum 5 minutes prior to pick up time for the tours and transfers.

SIC tours dates & times may change, pick-up times may change even after the clients have received the schedule. Sometimes museums or roads or weather is not suitable for certain tours and thus the date or time of the tour is changed by operations department.
Please note that full day private tour timings are from 09.00 – 17.00 or 10.00 – 18.00. These are pick up and drop off times from/to hotel.
* Prices are per person in Euro and may vary based on season and availability
* Prices are valid from 15/03/2026 till 15/11/2026
* Tour category will be confirmed at time of booking

itinerary.description: After breakfast drive to Pamukkale which is the center of natural thermal spring waters with healing properties. Overnight in Pamukkale.

itinerary.title: Pamukkale - Drive to Kusadasi
itinerary.description: After breakfast, pick up from the hotel and transfer to your hotel in Kusadasi. It takes about 3 hours. Arrive in Kusadasi and check in your hotel. The rest of the day is yours. Overnight in Kusadasi.

itinerary.title: Kusadasi – Ephesus & Sirince Full Day Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast, departure for full day tour for ancient city of Ephesus, one of the most well-preserved archaeological sites in the world and also includes a visit to the iconic Temple of Artemis, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World. You will explore The Grand Theater, The Library of Celsus, The Temple of Hadrian, The Curetes Street.  After concluding the tour of Ephesus, you will proceed Sirince Village. Sirince is a cute little village with a fun history, beautiful views, wonderful food, hospitality, and so much more. It's perhaps the perfect synthesis of a traditional Turkish village and traditional Greek village. After the tour, transfer back to hotel.  Overnight in Kusadasi.

itinerary.title: Kusadasi - Izmir / Fly / Istanbul / Fly
itinerary.description: After breakfast, check out from the hotel. You will have free time until transfers to Izmir airport for your flight back to Istanbul to catch your flight to your next destination. The tour ends with great memories. Have a safe trip back home and thanks for choosing Funny Tourism for your holiday.

itineraryEs.title: Estambul – Tour de Día Completo
itineraryEs.description: Después del desayuno en el hotel, a tour guiado to Hipódromo, Palacio de Topkapi, St. Sophia, Mezquita Azul and the Gran Bazar will commence. After the tour, transfer back to hotel. Pernocte in Estambul.

itineraryEs.title: Estambul – Tour de Día Completo incl. Crucero por el Bósforo
itineraryEs.description: Después del desayuno, su tour comenzará with Bazar de las Especias and then it goes on with Bósforo Cruise (Boat is not private). In the afternoon cross over the Bósforo Bridge to Asia and visit Camlica Hill. Transfer back to your hotel for pernocte. Pernocte in Estambul.

itineraryEs.title: Estambul / Vuelo / Capadocia
itineraryEs.description: Después del desayuno, you will transfer to Estambul or SAW airport for your flight to Kayseri or Nevsehir. Arrive in Kayseri or Nevsehir airport and transfer to your hotel. Pernocte in Capadocia.

itineraryEs.title: Capadocia – Tour de Día Completo
itineraryEs.description: Después del desayuno, depart for our Capadocia tour including Dervent (Imagination Valley) Zelve Open Air Museum, Pasabag Valley, Cavusin Village. This tour is including Indian Lunch in Pukka Indian Restaurant. After lunch, we will make a shopping tour in which you will be aware of the ancient arts of Turkey like carpet weaving, leather manufacturing and jewellery. As this will be a tour guiado, you will avoid being hassled which will enable you enjoy the shopping experience whilst gaining the knowledge of the ancient craftsmen. After the tour, transfer to your hotel. Free evening. Pernocte in Capadocia.

itineraryEs.title: Capadocia – Tour de Día Completo
itineraryEs.description: Después del desayuno, depart for our Capadocia tour including Ozkonak Underground City Goreme Panorama, Pigeon Valley, Uchisar Castle from outside. This tour is including Indian Lunch in Pukka Indian Restaurant. After the tour, transfer to your hotel. Free evening. Pernocte in Capadocia.

itineraryEs.title: Capadocia - Kayseri / Vuelo / Antalya
itineraryEs.description: Después del desayuno, check out from the hotel and we will transfer you to Kayseri airport for your flight to Antalya. Arrive in Antalya airport and transfer to your hotel. Pernocte in Antalya.

itineraryEs.title: Antalya – Tour de Día Completo
itineraryEs.description: Después del desayuno, depart for sightseeing of Antalya. Meet your guide and drive to Duden Waterfalls the place where the falls meet the sea and have a photo break in Konyaalti beach. Then visit to old town with the gate of Hadrian, the Clock Tower, Fluted Minaret, Palm Street and the ancient harbor. There are many beautiful old houses in Kaleici. After the tour return to the hotel. Pernocte in Antalya.

itineraryEs.title: Antalya – Pamukkale Tour de Día Completo
itineraryEs.description: Después del desayuno drive to Pamukkale which is the center of natural thermal spring waters with healing properties. Then visit the travertines and the ancient city of Hierapolis which has the biggest Nekropol with 1200 gravestones in Anatolia. After tour, we will drive to our hotel at Antalya. Pernocte in Antalya.

itineraryEs.title: Antalya / Vuelo / Estambul / Vuelo
itineraryEs.description: Después del desayuno, check out from the hotel. You will have free time until transfer to Antalya airport for your flight back to Estambul to catch your flight to your next destination. The tour ends with great memories. Have a safe trip back home and thanks for choosing Funny Tourism for your holiday.

information: Official Holidays and Religious Festivals: Grand Bazaar and Spice Market will be closed.
Grand Bazaar is closed on Sundays,
Topkapi Palace is closed on Tuesdays,
Beylerbeyi Palace and Dolmabahce Palace are closed on Mondays,

Please take in consideration dress code for the tours. Ex: comfortable shoes and clothes made of cotton or heavy coats for winter. Shorts are not allowed when entering mosques and please do not forget to carry Scarf with you because of visiting to Blue Mosque & St.Sophia Mosque.
If you have a tour and you must check-out on the same day to transfer to airport or for land transfer, please check out from the hotel in the morning before your tour.
Cappadocia hot air balloon rides pick-up times are always decided 1-day before the activity, we usually contact the clients via Whats App or hotel phone or in-person to inform them.
Please be ready on lobby floor minimum 5 minutes prior to pick up time for the tours and transfers.

SIC tours dates & times may change, pick-up times may change even after the clients have received the schedule. Sometimes museums or roads or weather is not suitable for certain tours and thus the date or time of the tour is changed by operations department.

itinerary.title: Istanbul – Full Day Princes Islands Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast, we pick up you from your hotel to transfer you to the public boat from Istanbul to the Princes's Island which takes 1 hour and 30 minutes.  Our guided tour to the Island keeps going for electric car tour of the island. You will sit and see all around the Island and enjoy the beautiful ottoman wooden houses mostly from 19th century. The Island was called Prinkipo which means Princes's. You will get fresh air from the pine trees on the slopes of the hill of the island. Then you will have 1 hour free time to walk along the Marmara Sea. In the island to taste famous ice-cream, delicious Lokma dessert or having relaxing time by sitting and watching the sea. While sipping your Turkish coffee or Turkish tea in a cafe if you wish. After your free time you will meet your tour guide in a meeting point across the pier to enjoy the boat ride back to Istanbul. Arrival and transfer back to your hotel. Overnight in Istanbul.

itinerary.description: After breakfast, rest of the day is free at leisure till depart for departure airport transfer to your next destination.

title: Istanbul, Kusadasi, Ephesus & Pamukkale 5 Nights Private Tour - Land Only
description: Experience the best of Istanbul, Kusadasi, Ephesus, Pamukkale with this 5 Nights / 6 Days package. Arrive to Istanbul or SAW airport in Istanbul. Arrival transfer to the hotel and check-in. The rest of the day is yours. In the evening, you will pick up from the hotel and transfer to Bosphorus Cruis...

itinerary.title: Fly / Istanbul - Bosphorus Cruise Dinner
itinerary.description: Arrive to Istanbul or SAW airport in Istanbul. Arrival transfer to the hotel and check-in. The rest of the day is yours. In the evening, you will pick up from the hotel and transfer to Bosphorus Cruise Dinner. (Cruise is not private) Enjoy delicious gourmet foods while you dance with the panaromic view of the Bosphorus that separates the two continents Europe and Asia. Enjoy as you cruise The Bosphorus and see historical places like Dolmabahce Palace, Bosphorus Bridge, Ortakoy, Rumeli Fortress, Fatih Bridge, Beylerbeyi Palace, Maiden’s Tower and also Istanbuls very famous night clubs as you wine and dine the night away. No other Istanbul experience can match this unique combination of romantic ambiance. We combine fresh food with unparalleled views of Istanbul and live entertainment to create Istanbul‘s leading Bosphorus Dinner Cruise. Show Program is including Whirling Dervish, Turkish Gypsy Dance, Caucasian Dance, Belly Dancer Group Show, Turkish Folk Dance, Rhythm Show, Belly Dancer Professional DJ Performance. After the tour, transfer back to hotel. Overnight in Istanbul.

itinerary.title: Istanbul – Full Day Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast at the hotel, a guided tour to Hippodrome, Topkapi Palace, St. Sophia, Blue Mosque and the Grand Bazaar will commence. After the tour, transfer back to hotel. Overnight in Istanbul.

itinerary.title: Istanbul – Fly / Izmir - Kusadasi
itinerary.description: After breakfast, check out from the hotel and according to your flight time transfer you to Istanbul or SAW Airport for your domestic flight to Izmir. On arrival you will check in to your hotel. The rest of the day is yours. Overnight in Kusadasi.

itinerary.title: Kusadasi – Ephesus Full Day Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast, departure for full day tour for ancient city of Ephesus, one of the most well-preserved archaeological sites in the world and also includes a visit to the iconic Temple of Artemis, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World. You will explore The Grand Theater, The Library of Celsus, The Temple of Hadrian, The Curetes Street.  After concluding the tour of Ephesus, you will proceed Sirince Village. Sirince is a cute little village with a fun history, beautiful views, wonderful food, hospitality, and so much more. It's perhaps the perfect synthesis of a traditional Turkish village and traditional Greek village. After the tour, transfer back to hotel.  Overnight in Kusadasi.

itinerary.title: Kusadasi – Pamukkale Full Day Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast drive to Pamukkale which is the center of natural thermal spring waters with healing properties. Then visit the travertines and the ancient city of Hierapolis which has the biggest Nekropol with 1200 gravestones in Anatolia. After tour, we will drive to our hotel at Kusadasi. Overnight in Kusadasi.

itinerary.title: Kusadasi / Fly / Istanbul / Fly
itinerary.description: After breakfast, check out from the hotel. According to your flight time transfer to Izmir airport to have your flight to Istanbul for your next destination. The tour ends with great memories. Have a safe trip back home and thanks for choosing Funny Tourism for your holiday.

title: Istanbul, Kusadasi, Ephesus & Pamukkale 6 Nights Private Tour - Land Only
description: Experience the best of Istanbul, Kusadasi, Ephesus, Pamukkale with this 6 Nights / 7 Days package. Arrive to Istanbul or SAW airport in Istanbul. Arrival transfer to the hotel and check-in. The rest of the day is yours. Overnight in Istanbul....

itinerary.title: Fly / Istanbul
itinerary.description: Arrive to Istanbul or SAW airport in Istanbul. Arrival transfer to the hotel and check-in. The rest of the day is yours. Overnight in Istanbul.

itinerary.title: Istanbul – Full Day Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast at the hotel, a guided tour to Hippodrome, Topkapi Palace, St. Sophia, Blue Mosque and the Grand Bazaar will commence. After the tour, transfer back to hotel. Overnight in Istanbul.

itinerary.title: Istanbul – Full Day Tour incl. Bosphorus Cruise
itinerary.description: After breakfast, your tour will start with Spice Bazaar and then it goes on with Bosphorus Cruise (Boat is not private). In the afternoon cross over the Bosphorus Bridge to Asia and visit Camlica Hill. Transfer back to your hotel for overnight. Overnight in Istanbul.

itinerary.title: Istanbul / Fly / Izmir – Kusadasi
itinerary.description: After breakfast, according to your flight time you will transfer to Istanbul or SAW airport for your flight to Izmir. Arrive in Izmir airport and transfer to your hotel. Overnight in Kusadasi.

itinerary.title: Kusadasi – Ephesus & Sirince Full Day Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast, departure for full day tour for ancient city of Ephesus, one of the most well-preserved archaeological sites in the world and also includes a visit to the iconic Temple of Artemis, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World. You will explore The Grand Theater, The Library of Celsus, The Temple of Hadrian, The Curetes Street.  After concluding the tour of Ephesus, you will proceed Sirince Village. Sirince is a cute little village with a fun history, beautiful views, wonderful food, hospitality, and so much more. It's perhaps the perfect synthesis of a traditional Turkish village and traditional Greek village. After the tour, transfer back to hotel.  Overnight in Kusadasi.

itinerary.title: Kusadasi – Pamukkale Full Day Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast drive to Pamukkale which is the center of natural thermal spring waters with healing properties. Then visit the travertines and the ancient city of Hierapolis which has the biggest Nekropol with 1200 gravestones in Anatolia. After tour, we will drive to our hotel at Kusadasi. Overnight in Kusadasi.

itinerary.title: Kusadasi - Izmir/ Fly / Istanbul / Fly
itinerary.description: After breakfast, check out from the hotel. You will have free time until transfer to Izmir airport for your flight back to Istanbul to catch your flight to your next destination. The tour ends with great memories. Have a safe trip back home and thanks for choosing Funny Tourism for your holiday.

title: Istanbul, Cappadocia, Kusadasi, Ephesus & Pamukkale 7 Nights Private Tour - Land Only
description: Experience the best of Istanbul, Cappadocia, Kusadasi, Ephesus, Pamukkale with this 7 Nights / 8 Days package. Arrive to Istanbul or SAW airport in Istanbul. Arrival transfer to the hotel and check-in. The rest of the day is yours. In the evening, you will pick up from the hotel and transfer to Bosphorus Cruis...

itinerary.title: Fly / Istanbul - Bosphorus Cruise Dinner
itinerary.description: Arrive to Istanbul or SAW airport in Istanbul. Arrival transfer to the hotel and check-in. The rest of the day is yours. In the evening, you will pick up from the hotel and transfer to Bosphorus Cruise Dinner. (Cruise is not private) Enjoy delicious gourmet foods while you dance with the panaromic view of the Bosphorus that separates the two continents Europe and Asia. Enjoy as you cruise The Bosphorus and see historical places like Dolmabahce Palace, Bosphorus Bridge, Ortakoy, Rumeli Fortress , Fatih Bridge, Beylerbeyi Palace, Maiden’s Tower and also Istanbuls very famous night clubs as you wine and dine the night away. No other Istanbul experience can match this unique combination of romantic ambiance. We combine fresh food with unparalleled views of Istanbul and live entertainment to create Istanbul‘s leading Bosphorus Dinner Cruise. Show Program is including Whirling Dervish, Turkish Gypsy Dance, Caucasian Dance, Belly Dancer Group Show, Turkish Folk Dance, Rhythm Show, Belly Dancer Professional DJ Performance. After the tour, transfer back to hotel. Overnight in Istanbul.

itinerary.title: Istanbul – Full Day Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast at the hotel, a guided tour to Hippodrome, Topkapi Palace, St. Sophia, Blue Mosque and the Grand Bazaar will commence. After the tour, transfer back to hotel. Overnight in Istanbul.

itinerary.title: Istanbul – Fly / Cappadocia
itinerary.description: After breakfast, check out from the hotel and according to your flight time transfer to Istanbul or SAW airport for your flight to Kayseri or Nevsehir. Arrive in Kayseri or Nevsehir airport and transfer to your hotel in Cappadocia. Overnight in Cappadocia.

itinerary.title: Cappadocia – Full Day Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast, depart for our Cappadocia tour including; Ozkonak Underground City, Dervent (Imagination Valley) Zelve Open Air Museum, Pasabag Valley, Goreme Panorama. After lunch break, we will make a shopping tour in which you will be aware of the ancient arts of Turkey like carpet weaving, leather manufacturing and jewellery. As this will be a guided tour, you will avoid being hassled which will enable you enjoy the shopping experience whilst gaining the knowledge of the ancient craftsmen. After the tour, transfer to your hotel. Free evening. Overnight in Cappadocia.

itinerary.title: Cappadocia - Kayseri Fly Izmir - Kusadasi
itinerary.description: After breakfast, you will pick up from the hotel and transfer to Kayseri airport for your flight to Izmir. Arrive in Izmir airport and transfer to your hotel in Kusadasi. The rest of the day is yours. Overnight in Kusadasi.

itinerary.title: Kusadasi – Ephesus & Sirince Full Day Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast, departure for full day tour for ancient city of Ephesus, one of the most well-preserved archaeological sites in the world and also includes a visit to the iconic Temple of Artemis, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World. You will explore The Grand Theater, The Library of Celsus, The Temple of Hadrian, The Curetes Street.  After concluding the tour of Ephesus, you will proceed Sirince Village. Sirince is a cute little village with a fun history, beautiful views, wonderful food, hospitality, and so much more. It's perhaps the perfect synthesis of a traditional Turkish village and traditional Greek village. After the tour, transfer back to hotel.  Overnight in Kusadasi.

itinerary.title: Kusadasi – Pamukkale Full Day Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast drive to Pamukkale which is the center of natural thermal spring waters with healing properties. Then visit the travertines and the ancient city of Hierapolis which has the biggest Nekropol with 1200 gravestones in Anatolia. After tour, we will drive to our hotel at Kusadasi. Overnight in Kusadasi.

itinerary.title: Kusadasi - Izmir / Fly / Istanbul / Fly
itinerary.description: After breakfast, check out from the hotel. You will have free time until transfer to Izmir airport for your flight back to Istanbul to catch your flight to your next destination. The tour ends with great memories. Have a safe trip back home and thanks for choosing Funny Tourism for your holiday.

included: Meals are as per itinerary with code letters (B=Breakfast, L=Lunch, D=Dinner)
Return airport transfers on Private basis

Bosphorus Cruise Dinner with Turkish Night Show including unlimited non-alcohol soft drinks (if you want to unlimited local alcohol drinks, we will add to 10 EUR pp to the cost) with return transfers on SIC basis
Professional English-Speaking Guidance on tour days
Sightseeings as per itinerary on Private basis with entrance fees for mentioned places
Local Taxes

information: Official Holidays and Religious Festivals: Grand Bazaar and Spice Market will be closed.
Grand Bazaar is closed on Sundays,
Topkapi Palace is closed on Tuesdays,
Beylerbeyi Palace and Dolmabahce Palace are closed on Mondays,

Please take in consideration dress code for the tours. Ex: comfortable shoes and clothes made of cotton or heavy coats for winter. Shorts are not allowed when entering mosques and please do not forget to carry Scarf with you because of visiting to Blue Mosque & St.Sophia Mosque.
If you have a tour and you must check-out on the same day to transfer to airport or for land transfer, please check out from the hotel in the morning before your tour.
Cappadocia hot air balloon rides pick-up times are always decided 1-day before the activity, we usually contact the clients via Whats App or hotel phone or in-person to inform them.
Please be ready on lobby floor minimum 5 minutes prior to pick up time for the tours and transfers.

SIC tours dates & times may change, pick-up times may change even after the clients have received the schedule. Sometimes museums or roads or weather is not suitable for certain tours and thus the date or time of the tour is changed by operations department.
* Prices are per person in Euro and may vary based on season and availability
* Prices are valid from 15/03/2026 till 15/11/2026
* Tour category will be confirmed at time of booking

itineraryEs.description: Llegada a Estambul or SAW airport in Estambul. Traslado de llegada al hotel and registro. The rest of the day is yours. Pernocte in Estambul.

itineraryEs.title: Estambul – Tour de Día Completo
itineraryEs.description: Después del desayuno en el hotel, a tour guiado to Hipódromo, Palacio de Topkapi, St. Sophia, Mezquita Azul and the Gran Bazar will commence. After the tour, transfer back to hotel. Pernocte in Estambul.

itineraryEs.title: Estambul – Tour de Día Completo incl. Crucero por el Bósforo
itineraryEs.description: Después del desayuno, su tour comenzará with Bazar de las Especias and then it goes on with Bósforo Cruise (Boat is not private). In the afternoon cross over the Bósforo Bridge to Asia and visit Camlica Hill. Transfer back to your hotel for pernocte. Pernocte in Estambul.

itineraryEs.title: Estambul / Vuelo / Capadocia
itineraryEs.description: Después del desayuno, according to your flight time you will transfer to Estambul or SAW airport for your flight to Kayseri or Nevsehir. Arrive in Kayseri or Nevsehir airport and transfer to your hotel. Pernocte in Capadocia.

itineraryEs.title: Capadocia – Tour de Día Completo
itineraryEs.description: Después del desayuno, depart for our Capadocia tour including; Ozkonak Underground City, Dervent (Imagination Valley) Zelve Open Air Museum, Pasabag Valley, Goreme Panorama. After lunch break, we will make a shopping tour in which you will be aware of the ancient arts of Turkey like carpet weaving, leather manufacturing and jewellery. As this will be a tour guiado, you will avoid being hassled which will enable you enjoy the shopping experience whilst gaining the knowledge of the ancient craftsmen. After the tour, transfer to your hotel. Free evening. Pernocte in Capadocia.

itineraryEs.title: Capadocia - Kayseri / Vuelo / Izmir - Kusadasi
itineraryEs.description: Después del desayuno, we will transfer you to the Kayseri Airport for your domestic flight to Izmir. On arrival you will check in to your hotel. The rest of the day is yours. Pernocte in Kusadasi.

itineraryEs.title: Kusadasi – Éfeso & Sirince Tour de Día Completo
itineraryEs.description: Después del desayuno, departure for full day tour for ancient city of Éfeso, one of the most well-preserved archaeological sites in the world and also includes a visit to the iconic Temple of Artemis, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World. You will explore The Grand Theater, The Library of Celsus, The Temple of Hadrian, The Curetes Street.  After concluding the tour of Éfeso, you will proceed Sirince Village. Sirince is a cute little village with a fun history, beautiful views, wonderful food, hospitality, and so much more. It's perhaps the perfect synthesis of a traditional Turkish village and traditional Greek village. After the tour, transfer back to hotel.  Pernocte in Kusadasi.

itineraryEs.title: Kusadasi – Pamukkale Tour de Día Completo
itineraryEs.description: Después del desayuno drive to Pamukkale which is the center of natural thermal spring waters with healing properties. Then visit the travertines and the ancient city of Hierapolis which has the biggest Nekropol with 1200 gravestones in Anatolia. After tour, we will drive to our hotel at Kusadasi. Pernocte in Kusadasi.

itineraryEs.title: Kusadasi / Vuelo / Izmir / Vuelo
itineraryEs.description: Después del desayuno, check out from the hotel. You will have free time until transfer to Izmir airport for your flight back to Estambul to catch your flight to your next destination. The tour ends with great memories. Have a safe trip back home and thanks for choosing Funny Tourism for your holiday.

title: Istanbul, Kusadasi, Ephesus, Pamukkale & Antalya 7 Nights Private Tour - Land Only
description: Experience the best of Istanbul, Kusadasi, Ephesus, Pamukkale, Antalya with this 7 Nights / 8 Days package. Arrive to Istanbul or SAW airport in Istanbul. Arrival transfer to the hotel and check-in. The rest of the day is yours. In the evening, you will pick up from the hotel and transfer to Bosphorus Cruis...

itinerary.title: Fly / Istanbul - Bosphorus Cruise Dinner
itinerary.description: Arrive to Istanbul or SAW airport in Istanbul. Arrival transfer to the hotel and check-in. The rest of the day is yours. In the evening, you will pick up from the hotel and transfer to Bosphorus Cruise Dinner. (Cruise is not private) Enjoy delicious gourmet foods while you dance with the panaromic view of the Bosphorus that separates the two continents Europe and Asia. Enjoy as you cruise The Bosphorus and see historical places like Dolmabahce Palace, Bosphorus Bridge, Ortakoy, Rumeli Fortress , Fatih Bridge, Beylerbeyi Palace, Maiden’s Tower and also Istanbuls very famous night clubs as you wine and dine the night away. No other Istanbul experience can match this unique combination of romantic ambiance. We combine fresh food with unparalleled views of Istanbul and live entertainment to create Istanbul‘s leading Bosphorus Dinner Cruise. Show Program is including Whirling Dervish, Turkish Gypsy Dance, Caucasian Dance, Belly Dancer Group Show, Turkish Folk Dance, Rhythm Show, Belly Dancer Professional DJ Performance. After the tour, transfer back to hotel. Overnight in Istanbul.

itinerary.title: Istanbul – Full Day Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast at the hotel, a guided tour to Hippodrome, Topkapi Palace, St. Sophia, Blue Mosque and the Grand Bazaar will commence. After the tour, transfer back to hotel. Overnight in Istanbul.

itinerary.title: Istanbul – Izmir/Kusadasi
itinerary.description: After breakfast, check out from the hotel and according to your flight time transfer to Istanbul or SAW airport for your flight to Izmir. Arrive in Izmir airport and transfer to your hotel in Kusadasi. The rest of the day is yours. Overnight in Kusadasi.

itinerary.title: Kusadasi – Ephesus & Sirince Full Day Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast, departure for full day tour for ancient city of Ephesus, one of the most well-preserved archaeological sites in the world and also includes a visit to the iconic Temple of Artemis, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World. You will explore The Grand Theater, The Library of Celsus, The Temple of Hadrian, The Curetes Street.  After concluding the tour of Ephesus, you will proceed Sirince Village. Sirince is a cute little village with a fun history, beautiful views, wonderful food, hospitality, and so much more. It's perhaps the perfect synthesis of a traditional Turkish village and traditional Greek village. After the tour, transfer back to hotel.  Overnight in Kusadasi.

itinerary.title: Kusadasi – Pamukkale Full Day Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast drive to Pamukkale which is the center of natural thermal spring waters with healing properties. Then visit the travertines and the ancient city of Hierapolis which has the biggest Nekropol with 1200 gravestones in Anatolia. After tour, we will drive to our hotel at Pamukkale. Overnight in Pamukkale.

itinerary.title: Pamukkale Drive to Antalya
itinerary.description: After breakfast, check-out from the hotel and drive to Antalya. It takes about 3 hours. Arrive to Antalya and check in your hotel. The rest of the day is yours. Overnight in Antalya.

itinerary.title: Antalya – Full Day Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast, depart for sightseeing of Antalya. Meet your guide and drive to Duden Waterfalls the place where the falls meet the sea and have a photo break in Konyaalti beach. Then visit to old town with the gate of Hadrian, the Clock Tower, Fluted Minaret, Palm Street and the ancient harbor. There are many beautiful old houses in Kaleici. After the tour return to the hotel. Overnight in Antalya.

itinerary.title: Antalya / Fly / Istanbul / Fly
itinerary.description: After breakfast, check out from the hotel. You will have free time until transfer to Antalya airport for your flight back to Istanbul to catch your flight to your next destination. The tour ends with great memories. Have a safe trip back home and thanks for choosing Funny Tourism for your holiday.

included: Meals are as per itinerary with code letters (B=Breakfast, L=Lunch, D=Dinner)
Return airport transfers on Private basis
Private transfer from Pamukkale to Antalya

Bosphorus Cruise Dinner with Turkish Night Show including unlimited non-alcohol soft drinks (if you want to unlimited local alcohol drinks, we will add to 10 EUR pp to the cost) with return transfers on SIC basis
Professional English-Speaking Guidance on tour days
Sightseeings as per itinerary on Private basis with entrance fees for mentioned places
Local Taxes
notIncluded: Tips to the driver and the guide
information: Official Holidays and Religious Festivals: Grand Bazaar and Spice Market will be closed.
Grand Bazaar is closed on Sundays,
Topkapi Palace is closed on Tuesdays,
Beylerbeyi Palace and Dolmabahce Palace are closed on Mondays,

Please take in consideration dress code for the tours. Ex: comfortable shoes and clothes made of cotton or heavy coats for winter. Shorts are not allowed when entering mosques and please do not forget to carry Scarf with you because of visiting to Blue Mosque & St.Sophia Mosque.
If you have a tour and you must check-out on the same day to transfer to airport or for land transfer, please check out from the hotel in the morning before your tour.
Cappadocia hot air balloon rides pick-up times are always decided 1-day before the activity, we usually contact the clients via Whats App or hotel phone or in-person to inform them.
Please be ready on lobby floor minimum 5 minutes prior to pick up time for the tours and transfers.

SIC tours dates & times may change, pick-up times may change even after the clients have received the schedule. Sometimes museums or roads or weather is not suitable for certain tours and thus the date or time of the tour is changed by operations department.
* Prices are per person in Euro and may vary based on season and availability
* Prices are valid from 15/03/2026 till 15/11/2026
* Tour category will be confirmed at time of booking

title: Istanbul, Cappadocia, Antalya, Pamukkale, Kusadasi & Ephesus 10 Nights Private Tour - Land Only
description: Experience the best of Istanbul, Cappadocia, Antalya, Pamukkale, Kusadasi, Ephesus with this 10 Nights / 11 Days package. Arrive to Istanbul or SAW airport in Istanbul. Arrival transfer to the hotel and check-in. The rest of the day is yours. Overnight in Istanbul....

itinerary.title: Fly / Istanbul
itinerary.description: Arrive to Istanbul or SAW airport in Istanbul. Arrival transfer to the hotel and check-in. The rest of the day is yours. Overnight in Istanbul.

itinerary.title: Istanbul – Full Day Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast at the hotel, a guided tour to Hippodrome, Topkapi Palace, St. Sophia, Blue Mosque and the Grand Bazaar will commence. After the tour, transfer back to hotel. Overnight in Istanbul.

itinerary.title: Istanbul – Full Day Tour incl. Bosphorus Cruise
itinerary.description: After breakfast, your tour will start with Spice Bazaar and then it goes on with Bosphorus Cruise (Boat is not private). In the afternoon cross over the Bosphorus Bridge to Asia and visit Camlica Hill. Transfer back to your hotel for overnight. Overnight in Istanbul.

itinerary.title: Istanbul / Fly / Cappadocia
itinerary.description: After breakfast, according to your flight time you will transfer to Istanbul or SAW airport for your flight to Kayseri or Nevsehir. Arrive in Kayseri or Nevsehir airport and transfer to your hotel. Overnight in Cappadocia.

itinerary.title: Cappadocia – Full Day Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast, depart for our Cappadocia tour including; Ozkonak Underground City, Dervent (Imagination Valley) Zelve Open Air Museum, Pasabag Valley, Goreme Panorama. After lunch break, we will make a shopping tour in which you will be aware of the ancient arts of Turkey like carpet weaving, leather manufacturing and jewellery. As this will be a guided tour, you will avoid being hassled which will enable you enjoy the shopping experience whilst gaining the knowledge of the ancient craftsmen. After the tour, transfer to your hotel. Free evening. Overnight in Cappadocia.

itinerary.title: Cappadocia / Fly / Antalya
itinerary.description: After breakfast, check out from the hotel and transfer to Kayseri airport for your flight to Antalya. Arrive in Antalya airport and transfer to your hotel in for check in. The rest of the day is yours. Overnight in Antalya.

itinerary.title: Antalya - Full Day Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast, depart for sightseeing of Antalya. Meet your guide and drive to Duden Waterfalls the place where the falls meet the sea and have a photo break in Konyaalti beach. Then visit to old town with the gate of Hadrian, the Clock Tower, Fluted Minaret, Palm Street and the ancient harbor. There are many beautiful old houses in Kaleici. After the tour return to the hotel. Overnight in Antalya.

itinerary.title: Antalya – Pamukkale Full Day Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast drive to Pamukkale which is the center of natural thermal spring waters with healing properties. Then visit the travertines and the ancient city of Hierapolis which has the biggest Nekropol with 1200 gravestones in Anatolia. After tour, we will drive to our hotel at Pamukkale. Overnight in Pamukkale.

itinerary.title: Pamukkale - Drive to Kusadasi
itinerary.description: After breakfast, pick up from the hotel and transfer to your hotel in Kusadasi. It takes about 3 hours. Arrive in Kusadasi and check in your hotel. The rest of the day is yours. Overnight in Kusadasi.

itinerary.title: Kusadasi – Ephesus & Sirince Full Day Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast, departure for full day tour for ancient city of Ephesus, one of the most well-preserved archaeological sites in the world and also includes a visit to the iconic Temple of Artemis, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World. You will explore The Grand Theater, The Library of Celsus, The Temple of Hadrian, The Curetes Street.  After concluding the tour of Ephesus, you will proceed Sirince Village. Sirince is a cute little village with a fun history, beautiful views, wonderful food, hospitality, and so much more. It's perhaps the perfect synthesis of a traditional Turkish village and traditional Greek village. After the tour, transfer back to hotel.  Overnight in Kusadasi.

itinerary.title: Kusadasi - Izmir / Fly / Istanbul / Fly
itinerary.description: After breakfast, check out from the hotel. You will have free time until transfers to Izmir airport for your flight back to Istanbul to catch your flight to your next destination. The tour ends with great memories. Have a safe trip back home and thanks for choosing Funny Tourism for your holiday.

information: Official Holidays and Religious Festivals: Grand Bazaar and Spice Market will be closed.
Grand Bazaar is closed on Sundays,
Topkapi Palace is closed on Tuesdays,
Beylerbeyi Palace and Dolmabahce Palace are closed on Mondays,

Please take in consideration dress code for the tours. Ex: comfortable shoes and clothes made of cotton or heavy coats for winter. Shorts are not allowed when entering mosques and please do not forget to carry Scarf with you because of visiting to Blue Mosque & St.Sophia Mosque.
If you have a tour and you must check-out on the same day to transfer to airport or for land transfer, please check out from the hotel in the morning before your tour.
Cappadocia hot air balloon rides pick-up times are always decided 1-day before the activity, we usually contact the clients via Whats App or hotel phone or in-person to inform them.
Please be ready on lobby floor minimum 5 minutes prior to pick up time for the tours and transfers.

SIC tours dates & times may change, pick-up times may change even after the clients have received the schedule. Sometimes museums or roads or weather is not suitable for certain tours and thus the date or time of the tour is changed by operations department.
